verse: नान्या स्पृहा रघुपते हृदयेऽस्मदीये सत्यं वदामि च भवानखिलान्तरात्मा । भक्तिं प्रयच्छ रघुपुंगव निर्भरां मे कामादिदोषरहितं कुरू मानसं च

words.रघुपते: O Lord of the Raghu dynasty (Rama)

overall_meaning: O Lord of the Raghu dynasty (Rama), I speak the truth that there is no other desire in my heart. You are the entire inner self. Bestow upon me devotion, O best among the Raghus, complete and free from desires and faults. Do mental devotion as well.
